Articles.Content:
With 0.25 so very close, I can't help but think ahead to full release, how incredible the game is going to be and after falling in love with the Assassins Creed: Unity trailer, I decided to go ahead and make my own version for KSP

What do you think the full release trailer will look like? I'd love to see everyone's takes on what they think KSP is about, how it will be marketed and the fun stuff that could be done once Spaceplanes+ is stock.
Considering the long history of this game, there should be at least one scene with previous versions of the space center flashing by.

tl;dr: Beautiful! I really like this. I have some caveats, but this is very good.

Old fogy bloviation: Nicely done! I like the emphasis on action that is the result of deliberative exploration rather than explosions for lulz. The music choice, while a beautiful cover of the Tears For Fears tune, doesn't mesh very well though. I think it's the lyrics, which are a bit too dark for KSP. IMHO KSP revives the techo-optimism of the mid-20th century, and it needs lyrical content similarly positive in outlook. On the other hand, I like that you avoided the stereotypical marshal instrumental score ala Star Trek: TNG. Overall I'd like to see more action-exploration shots in a KSP trailer, and fewer tracking shots of the space center.

Edited September 28, 2014 by lincourtl

Very nice! I like the timings of the scene changes, the camera angles and the teaser shots of "stuff" happening. I agree with lincourtl, not 100% sure about the music, it does work, but the lyrics are perhaps a bit detracting (not saying you should change it thou, I know how much effort it takes to sync music to vids and you've done a great job of that, just a suggestion for your next one!)

Overall, very good.
Maybe something like a redesigned and remastered edition of "Build, Fly, Dream" is in order here. The old classic...

Considering the long history of this game, there should be at least one scene with previous versions of the space center flashing by.

yes and all the buildings destroyed
Had to add (Unofficial) and move this to fanworks glen.mack, it's great but could confuse people into thinking 0.25 was actually released
Very well done and awesome! *throws rep at OP*
This is really cool I love it
Thanks for all the positive feedback guys, might have another video next weekend!
Awesome, i was just thinking about that trailer, and was about to create a ksp war trailer that would actually fit with the song as well as you did
